title: Fix Dashboard Layout and Responsiveness
description: Improve the dashboard's layout and responsiveness by addressing inconsistent spacing, grid issues, card alignment, sidebar behavior, and empty states.

details.problem: The dashboard layout has several issues affecting its usability and visual appeal across different screen sizes.
objectives: Ensure consistent spacing and padding throughout the dashboard
Fix grid layout issues on various screen sizes
Improve card component alignment and consistency
Enhance responsive behavior of the right sidebar
Implement proper handling of empty states
acceptanceCriteria: Layout maintains visual balance on all screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Consistent spacing and padding between all elements
Cards are properly aligned and sized
Sidebar stacks appropriately on mobile devices
Empty states provide clear guidance to users
technicalNotes: Review and update the Dashboard.tsx component
Use Tailwind CSS for responsive design
Test on various screen sizes using browser dev tools
Ensure proper TypeScript types are used
